name: SimpleRandomNumberGenerator
0:
”Alexa, ask random number for a number between 1 and 100”
”Alexa, ask random number for a number between 100 and 350”
”Alexa, ask random number to give me a number between 200 and 300”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random number
des: A simple random number generator that also allows restricting to multiples of a number. For example, you can ask for any random number between 1 and 100, or a number between 1 and 100 that divides by 7.
